entities.name: the advanced guard
entities.description: A group of people, mentioned as 'we' in the text. They are supposed to be packing and getting ready to go.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: The main character, Harry. He is being told by Tonks that they need to get going and pack.

entities.name: tonks
entities.description: A person who is helping Harry pack. She has a wand and uses magic to pack their belongings.

entities.name: mum
entities.description: Tonks' mother, mentioned as having a knack for packing efficiently.

relationships.description: Tonks is helping Harry pack their belongings.
Tonks has a mother, who is mentioned as having a knack for packing efficiently.
